mapper.select: SELECT u.seq, u.name FROM sm_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_mall m ON(u.seq=m.seq) WHERE u.type_code='M' ORDER BY u.name ASC, u.seq DESC

SELECT u.seq, u.id, u.name, u.status_code AS statusCode, m.url, m.pay_method AS payMethod, m.pg_code AS pgCode, m.pg_id AS pgId, m.pg_key AS pgKey, m.open_date AS openDate, m.close_date AS closeDate, u.mod_date AS modDate, u.reg_date AS regDate FROM sm_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_mall m ON (u.seq=m.seq) WHERE u.seq=#{value}

SELECT u.id, m.login_banner1 AS loginbanner1, m.login_info1 AS logininfo1, m.login_info2 AS logininfo2, m.join_flag AS joinflag, m.mobile_flag AS mobileFlag FROM sm_mall m LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_user u ON (m.seq = u.seq) WHERE u.id = #{value} AND u.type_code = 'M'

SELECT m.seq, u.id, u.name, u.status_code AS statusCode, m.pg_code AS pgCode, m.pg_id AS pgId, m.pg_key AS pgkey, m.pay_method AS payMethod FROM sm_mall m LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_user u ON (m.seq=u.seq) WHERE u.id=#{value} AND u.type_code='M'
